Title: Allows lawfully acquired golden eagles, peregrine falcons and their progeny to be used for the purpose of falconry
Summary: Allows lawfully acquired golden eagles, peregrine falcons and their progeny to be used for the purpose of falconry.
LawCode: Amd ยง11-1001, En Con L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to falconry
